title: BALANCE Organic Herbal Tea — Retreat
author: Organic Reusable Tea-Bag £
description: A truly nourishing blend of herbs, Raspberry leaf, Red Clover, Hibiscus, Sage, Chamomile, Rosa Damascena, Lemonbalm, and Liquorice Root. Created to support women find flow and balance, both physically and in day to day life. 60g Approx 45 cups (15p per serving)
